english_example_sentence: That young teacher is someone who always asks curious questions.
russian_example_sentence: Этот молодой учитель — тот, кто всегда задает любопытные вопросы.
turkish_example_sentence: O genç öğretmen, her zaman meraklı sorular soran biridir.
